data.name: Nicolás Arias
data.Profile: Fullstack Developer focusend in frontend. Currently Software Engineer at Bismark Colombia. Experience in Frontend Development using HTML5, CSS3, Javascript(ES6+), Vue, AngularJs and React (personal projects only). In Backend with NodeJs and GraphQl. And in mobile development with Kotlin and React Native. Lifelong learner, currently learning computer science fundamentals.

Academic.description: Technical formation in software development, learn about the whole process of building large scale software. Design Patterns, OOP, web and mobile development.

experience.jobDescription:
Bismark Colombia is a telecomunicatios and IoT company industry's leader in Colombia. There I develope high quality user faced software in an agile and highly talented team.
In my daily work, I have to use technologies like JavaScript ,HTML, CSS and AngularJs for web apps. NodeJs for microservices, IoT agents and AWS lambdas. Also, I have to do development of new features of an already existed Android app.
All of that integrated with the cloud platform Cumulocity IoT.

Developing end to end web and mobile applications as freelancers in a small but highly talented team.
Stack used ES6, VueJs, React Native, NodeJs, MongoDB and GraphQL.
